channel.title: 06Prime 2006 Remake
channel.description:
[center][center][img]http://web.archive.org/web/20130807084840im_/http://www.06prime.com/images/logo.png[/img][/center]
[size=13pt][b]Forums: http://06prime.com/community/ Webclient: http://06prime.com/play.html Download: http://www.mediafire.com/download/f5y2az0qokbrz9h/06Prime+Client.jar.jar[/b][/size]
We are going to try my best and update this thread daily. Please support as at 06Prime.com! I'll make sure to go over the thread and add anything that I have forgotten..
[COLOR=#00b300]Completed all F2P Quests[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Black Knights' Fortress Cook's Assistant Demon Slayer Doric's Quest Dragon Slayer[/COLOR] [COLOR=#00b300]Ernest the Chicken[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Goblin Diplomacy [Have to finish off some goblin dialogue] Imp Catcher The Knight's Sword Pirate's Treasure[/COLOR] [COLOR=#00b300]Prince Ali Rescue[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]The Restless Ghost Romeo & Juliet Rune Mysteries Quest Sheep Shearer[/COLOR] [COLOR=#00b300]Shield of Arrav[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Vampire Slayer Witch's Potion[/COLOR]
[COLOR=orange]Completed all P2P Quests[/COLOR] [COLOR=#00b300]Monkey Madness[/COLOR] [COLOR=orange]The Grand Tree Recruitment Drive [COLOR=green]Druidic Ritual[/COLOR][/COLOR] [COLOR=orange][COLOR=green]Priest in Peril[/COLOR][/COLOR] [COLOR=#ff8000]Plague City[/COLOR] [COLOR=orange][COLOR=green]Witch's House[/COLOR][/COLOR] [COLOR=orange][COLOR=green]Death Plateau[/COLOR][/COLOR] [COLOR=orange]Troll Stronghold Digsite Quest[/COLOR] [COLOR=#00b300]Fishing Contest Clock Tower Elemental Workshop[/COLOR] [COLOR=orange]Jungle Potion[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Tree Gnome Village Monk's Friend Lost City[/COLOR] [COLOR=orange]Gertrude's Cat Waterfall Quest[/COLOR]
[COLOR=orange]Completed all Miniquests[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Tutorial Island Mage of Zamorak miniquest Mage Arena[/COLOR]
[COLOR=orange]Completed all Minigames[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Duel Arena[/COLOR] [COLOR=orange]Fight Pits [Just got to finish off the rewards][/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Fight Caves[/COLOR] [COLOR=orange][Pest Control [NPC VS NPC Combat system-Multiple NPCs attacking Void Knight-BOAT WAITING SYSTEM working timers & requirements, Coded a system where NPCs are spawned at the start of the game & destroyed at the end of the game-NPCs walk from portal to Void Knight & will wait at the gate if it's shut] Castle Wars [Partially coded, not much done][/COLOR] [COLOR=red]Fishing Trawler[/COLOR]
[COLOR=orange]Completed all Bosses[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Giant Mole Kalphite Queen[/COLOR] [COLOR=orange]Chaos Elemental [Have to add removable weapons & teleporting effects][/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Dagganoth Kings King Black Dragon[/COLOR]
[COLOR=orange]Completed all Random Events[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Genie Drunken dwarf[/COLOR] [COLOR=orange]ScapeRune[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Ent tree Explosive mining rocks[/COLOR] [COLOR=orange]Quiz Random Event[/COLOR] [COLOR=#00b300]Mime Random Event[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Flying pickaxe heads Flying axe heads Whirlpool fishing Big fish stealing equipment Evil chicken Freaky Forester River troll Rock golem Shade Spirit tree Zombie[/COLOR]
[COLOR=green]Misc
Ground items (items wait for 60 seconds before becoming public, then disappear after an additional 150 seconds. Untradable items disappear after 180 seconds from being dropped) Water fillables (using vials, buckets, jugs, etc. on water sources) Pickables (cabbages, onions, wheat, etc.) Skill interfaces Item weight Treasure trails Clue scroll system Kill some monster to get the key for a chest/drawers (level3 clues) Puzzles Simple Clues Puzzle : hover your mouse on the hint icon to get a hint Anagram Scrolls Challenge Scrolls Cryptics Coordinate(need sextant, chart, and watch to dig) Speak to clues key to open drawers and chests Digging clues Map Scrolls Search Scrolls Mage book making(torn pages) Every clue level reward(25+ rewards) Npcs dropping clue scrolls[/COLOR]
[B]SKILLS[/B]
[IMG]http://web.archive.org/web/20121116125603im_/http://i.imgur.com/2EJAV.gif[/img][COLOR=green]Combat
PvP fully complete PvN fully complete NvN system working X-logging (if disconnected during combat, logs out only after 60secs or death) Perfect max hit formulas Perfect accuracy formula Every weapon special attack Equipment effects (i.e. barrows) Equipment requirements Degradable equipment Weapon poisoning[/COLOR]
[IMG]http://web.archive.org/web/20121116125603im_/http://i.imgur.com/HhYtx.gif[/img][COLOR=green]Magic
Every modern combat spell Every ancient combat spell Can't mage through walls Staves that give unlimited amount of runes working Charge w/ godspells Iban blast/Slayer dart Weakening spells Teleblock/binding/freezing Every other spell including: B2b/B2p Charging orbs Alching/Superheat Enchanting jewelry[/COLOR]
[IMG]http://web.archive.org/web/20121116125603im_/http://i.imgur.com/C2xH2.gif[/img][COLOR=green]Ranged
Bows/arrows Throwing weapons (knives, darts, javelins, throwing axes) Crossbows (the regular one and karil's) Can't shoot through walls Ranged distances (9 steps for long range, 7 steps for normal)[/COLOR]
[IMG]http://web.archive.org/web/20121116125603im_/http://i.imgur.com/t0SHW.gif[/img][COLOR=green]Prayer
All bones bury-able Every prayer working properly Prayer bonus affects prayer drain rate[/COLOR]
[IMG]http://web.archive.org/web/20121116125603im_/http://i.imgur.com/4Ou9K.gif[/img][COLOR=green]Mining
Emptying and refilling rocks All ores can be mined Mining gems at shilo village Mining granite and sandstone (1kg/2kg/5kg/10kg) Correct pickaxe finding and animations Prospecting Random chance of obtaining gems Correct depleting of rocks chance algorithms[/COLOR]
[IMG]http://web.archive.org/web/20121116125603im_/http://i.imgur.com/Bbq6R.gif[/img][COLOR=green]Smithing
All bars can be made All bars can be forged into items All equipment can be produced Ring of forging Correct animations, interfaces and objects used[/COLOR]
[IMG]http://web.archive.org/web/20121116125603im_/http://i.imgur.com/HFOC2.gif[/img][COLOR=green]Fishing
All fish can be caught Big net fishing Vessel fishing(put a raw karambwan as a bait in the vessel and catch karambwan) Correct item requirements Fishing spots located all around the world Correct animations Moving fishing locations Fishing Platform[/COLOR]
[IMG]http://web.archive.org/web/20121116125603im_/http://i.imgur.com/Xvfj1.gif[/img][COLOR=green]Cooking
Meats Flour collecting Bread Pies Stews Pizzas Cakes Wine Hot drinks Potatoes Diary Brew making Cooking gauntlets Eating food (in pieces) Correct animation and timing used[/COLOR]
[IMG]http://web.archive.org/web/20121116125603im_/http://i.imgur.com/QrNzk.gif[/img][COLOR=green]Woodcutting
Stumps and regrowing trees Correct hatchet finding Correct hatchet animations All trees cut-able Correct fell chance algorithms Birds nest falling out[/COLOR]
[IMG]http://web.archive.org/web/20121116125603im_/http://i.imgur.com/0HOQK.gif[/img][COLOR=green]Firemaking
All logs light able Adding and depleting of lightened logs Firelighters Pyre log firemaking mort'ton temple(making sacred oil) Sacred oil to make pyre logs(correct doses) All lighting sources Colored fires "Backward" firelighting Ashes appear after logs burn out Correct animations Clipped[/COLOR]
[IMG]http://web.archive.org/web/20121116125603im_/http://i.imgur.com/YnmBh.gif[/img][COLOR=orange]Agility
Gnome Course[/COLOR] [COLOR=red]Wilderness, Course Pyramid plunder Brimhaven Course[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Run energy affected(weight + level) Force movement mask Correct animations used[/COLOR]
[IMG]http://web.archive.org/web/20121116125603im_/http://i.imgur.com/4jFcc.gif[/img][COLOR=green]Herblore
Correct animations Herb Identifying All potions can be made Correct first and secondary ingredients Coconut making Item grinding(pestle use) Poisoning weapons(all types) Can pour doses into other potions (must be the same potion)[/COLOR]
[IMG]http://web.archive.org/web/20121116125603im_/http://i.imgur.com/KbkQ8.gif[/img][COLOR=green]Thieving
NPC thievery working with correct stunning formula Can thieve from stalls and can get caught by surrounding guards Doors lockpicking and chests Correct animations and graphics used[/COLOR]
[IMG]http://web.archive.org/web/20121116125603im_/http://i.imgur.com/5zdcP.gif[/img][COLOR=green]Crafting
Cutting gems Making amulets, necklaces, and rings Stringing amulets and necklaces Tanning normal, hard, and dragon hide Crafting normal, hard, snakeskin, and dragon hide Crafting snakeskin Spinning wool and flax Making pottery Attaching studs[/COLOR]
[IMG]http://web.archive.org/web/20121116125603im_/http://i.imgur.com/bUmTj.gif[/img][COLOR=green]Runecrafting
Use of the Abyss Rock mining Tendrils chopping Boil burning Eyes distracting Gap crossing Passage Skulled when entering Prayer drained to 0 Dark mage repairing pouches
All altars working Correct multiple crafting Use of Pouches included Talismans "pull" to altars Tiaras enchanting Combining runes and their uses Mist runes Dust runes Mud runes Smoke runes Steam runes Lava runes Binding necklace(100% of combining rune if wielded, and has 15 charges)[/COLOR]
[IMG]http://web.archive.org/web/20121116125603im_/http://i.imgur.com/I4pJ6.gif[/img][COLOR=green]Fletching
All logs can be fletched Option interface for short or long bow (shafts if normal log) Can string bows Can make bolt-tips Darts Brutal arrows making Bow stringing Can make arrows[/COLOR]
[IMG]http://web.archive.org/web/20121116125603im_/http://i.imgur.com/HtjDm.gif[/img][COLOR=green]Slayer
All slayer masters Every monsters added for every tasks Burthorpe tasks Canifis tasks Edgeville tasks Lost city tasks Shilo village tasks Tips on killing monsters 'Special monsters' requires a specific slayer level and equipment to slay Slayer shops All slayer masters working Can ask for an easier task at burthorpe if you have a too hard task All equipment working Item that finishes off some monsters Equipment that are required to fight some monsters
Special monsters(Zygomite and mogre) Slayer gem working[/COLOR]
[IMG]http://web.archive.org/web/20121116125603im_/http://i.imgur.com/6DPd9.gif[/img][COLOR=green]Farming
Allotments All vegetables working Correct crop timings
Flowers All flowers and their effects working Correct flower timings
Herbs All herbs working Correct herbs timings
Hops All hops working Correct hops timings
Fruit Trees All fruit trees working Correct sapling growth timings Correct fruit tree growth timings
Trees All trees working Correct sapling growth timings Correct tree growth timings
Gardeners Watch over crops working Correct payments per type of crop
Compost Bin Supercompost making Compost making
Bushes berries regrowing after being picked Correct bush timings All bushes working
Tool Leprechaun Store items working Swaps noted items
All farming patches working Correct disease chance algorithm Special plants Spirit trees teleport to tree gnome Calquat trees Belladona trees Cactus trees
All tools working Magic secateurs[/COLOR]
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jeB6K1t_uxM[/youtube]
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XtGQcliVop8[/youtube]

item.description:
@wimstr wrote:

Release was epic.
Server crashed because of the amount of players in tutorial island.

Also that door at tutorial island is abused.

Come join now for the really old feeling.
Really nice so far.

And, owners are on to fix stuff. Pretty good fixes and content.

item.dc:creator: @Tree Tree
item.description:
@Tree wrote:

You’re all one big ball of stupid it seems.

Check for yourself, the staff team has been working on this server for a year+

I really hope not. For your sake.

Thanks bro!

-Full real pest control will be in Alpha!

Currently we are beta stage! check it out!

You’re going from beta to alpha… ?
I can’t help but cringe.

item.title: 06Prime 2006 Remake
item.dc:creator: @ChrisLuck ChrisLuck
item.description:
@ChrisLuck wrote:

I support this project! Its what i was looking for, but can you guys consider on change to 1,5xp Rate? It gonna be like the old runescape, and i consider it a good rate because another good server had it, with very good results “projectrs06”, and its kinda like to play the real rs2, I think its better than a 3x, because its like the old times The servers with a lot of advantage are less enjoyable, on my point of view. Easy things are kinda boring

PD: I speak spanish, doing my best english.!

Read full topic

item.title: 06Prime 2006 Remake
item.dc:creator: @idrumi idrumi
item.description:
@idrumi wrote:

i know all the other remakes and they don’t have most f2p quests… maybe 1 or 2 so you should name one because there is none

Read full topic

item.title: 06Prime 2006 Remake
item.dc:creator: @xEthanx xEthanx
item.description:
@xEthanx wrote:

idrumi:

all the other 06 remakes barely have any content compared to this, most of them don’t even have dragon weapons… this has all f2p quests done, 15 p2p quests, every skill except for agility complete. these are good reasons to pick this over any other remake

“All the other remakes.” Exactly which ones are you referring to? The only few I know that have lasted this long actually do have most f2p quests and the majority of skills as well. Lol “dragon weapons”? You consider that a large amount of content? They can be added in under an hour if you have a mental disability. It’s not exactly like you’re miles ahead.

[quote=“Michael P, post:40, topic:538924”][quote author=cal1 link=topic=657760.msg4410500#msg4410500 date=1393461862]
Well we got over 600 registered accounts, alpha’s going to be crazy
[/quote]

Lol. Registered accounts don’t mean anything. I’ve seen people with 2k+, but only have like 10 people playing.[/quote]
Pretty much what he said. The vast majority of your registered accounts will probably never even play, and that doesn’t account for all the forum bots that register to advertise links.

Neither of you really answered the questions I posed, you just kind of ignored them and posted an irrelevant detail.

Read full topic

item.title: 06Prime 2006 Remake

[quote=“banxyg, post:3, topic:538924”]Thanks bro!

-Full real pest control will be in Alpha!

Currently we are beta stage! check it out![/quote]

Can i call you retarded?
It goes Alpha, Beta, Full game. Not Beta, Alpha, Full Game. Alpha is always before Beta.

Read full topic
